text: Tamsui District Office () is a light rail station of the Green Mountain line of the Danhai Light Rail, which is operated by New Taipei Metro. It is located in Tamsui District, New Taipei, Taiwan. ==Station overview== The station is an elevated station with two side platforms. It is located above Binhai Road Section 1 near its intersection with District Road 1 (Zhongshan North Road Section 2). ==Station layout== {|cellspacing=0 cellpadding=3 |- |style="border-top:solid 1px gray;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100 rowspan=4 valign=top|2F |style="border-right:solid 2px black;border-left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 2px black;border-top:solid 1px gray" colspan=2 align=center|Side platform, doors open on the right |- |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=100|Platform 2 |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" width=350|← Green Mountain line to Hongshulin (V06 Xinshi 1st Rd) |- |Platform 1 |Green Mountain line to Kanding (V08 Binhai Yishan) → |- |style="border-top:solid 2px black;border-right:solid 2px black;border- left:solid 2px black;border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" colspan=2 align=center|Side platform, doors open on the right |- |style="border- bottom:solid 1px gray;" valign=top|Street level |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" valign=top|Entrance |style="border-bottom:solid 1px gray;" valign=top|Elevator, escalator, stairs |} ==Around the station== * Tamsui National Sports Center ==References== Category:2018 establishments in Taiwan Category:Railway stations opened in 2018 Category:Danhai light rail stations Category:Taiwanese railway station stubs
title: Tamsui District Office light rail station
